languages.text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness reduce the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.
languages.original_text: Каждая атака, совершаемая персонажем в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g} против целей, на которые действует эффект Выявление слабостей, снижает их {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 10.

traits.locale_text: The wearer's melee attacks against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness decrease the enemy's Strength and Agility by −10.

Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness reduce the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness reduce the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，如果目标受到暴露弱点效果影响，则此次攻击会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点。

languages.text: 使用者が弱点の露呈の効果を受けている敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行うごとに、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が-10減少する。
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness reduce the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が弱点の露呈の効果を受けている敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行うごとに、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が-10減少する。

languages.text: Cada uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador contra enemigos bajo el efecto de Exponer debilidad reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del enemigo en −10.
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness reduce the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

traits.locale_text: Cada uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador contra enemigos bajo el efecto de Exponer debilidad reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del enemigo en −10.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Trägers gegen Feinde unter dem Einfluss von Schwäche offenlegen verringern {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Feindes um −10.

languages.text: Chacune des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} que l'utilisateur lance contre des ennemis sous l'effet d'Identification des points faibles réduit de −10 la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de sa cible.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin Zayıflığı İfşa Et kabiliyetinin etkisi altında olan düşmanlara karşı yaptığı her {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliklerini 10 puan azaltır.
